snippet.title: Koloro - Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
Koloro is an ambiant platformer in which we wanted to tell a story set in a poetic universe through a contrasted graphic style with an enchanting soundscape and musical atmosphere.

The game, tells the story of a little girl who lost her sister. She embarks on a journey in an imaginary and poetic world in order to find her, through a contemplative puzzle/platform game.

http://skoll-studio.com/koloro
